column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place gets super crowded because it's delicious
column2: the sangria is awesome (and on tap)
column3: and the atmosphere is really laid back. If you don't have a reservation you should expect to wait. Also
column4: this is a Lettuce Entertain You restaurant so if you're expecting a cheap meal then you're going to be disappointed. That being said
column5: the prices are reasonable for the quality of the food that you're served.
